name: Yvette Terry
review: My first smart watch...lots of capabilities though some not available yet (For Example: Alexa) but works great for messages, calls and basic functionality and monitoring features. Very attractive watch and having the option to switch the front face keep its new if you get bored of one. Interested to see how things change with Google Wear OS 3!

name: Jones Ochoa
review: One of the great smartwatch I use . Great features and stainlessness still belt is unique totally different than any other watch which I like most I will recommended all my friends to buy this watch ..

name: Amelia Richards
review: This is my second attempt at Fossil smartwatch. I like the watch, however, battery life is an issue. Very difficult to get a full day of normal use and keep disconnecting from Wear OS app on iPhone.

name: Hilary Burt
review: I literally haven't had this watch for a week and am already having issues with it charging like seriously??? I didn't pay full price for me to have these issues less than a week. Don't like it already

name: Lauri Terrell
review: Like that it reads O2 and heart rate. Wish there was an in between setting that turned watch face on when you rotate to look at it, screen is either always on or always off - it does turn on if there's a notification though.

name: Mable Miranda
review: I really love the look of the Fossil smartwatches and had a gen 4 explorist prior to this gen 6. Love the speed of the gen 6 but the smaller screen makes it look kinda cheep. The watch itself looks a bit better and smoother than the old Gen4. The inclusion of the speaker is very nice. But man, that smaller screen and the resulting thick black bezel around it... Ugh.
